channel.title: Data on SQS
channel.description: Recent content in Data on SQS

item.title: rstudio::conf 2020
item.description: RStudio Conference 2020 Packages and Highlights and Random Packages and thoughts Sortable This was part of the poster session in the rstudio::conf() 2020. Great for drag and drop shiny objects from one bucket to other and capture the interaction in the server side. Sortable github page End-to-End Data Science with Shiny, Plumber and Pins This was a presentation by Alex Gold (@alexgold) engineer from RStudio. The workflow makes it easier for dploymment and sharing models and input data.

item.title: Elements of Data Strategy
item.description: Elements of Data Strategy Very interesting article by HBR What is you data strategy New way of looking at Data Management. I specially like the departure from the single source of truth argument to MVOTs. Elements of Data
